alert.note: Alert for Fall River; Oglala Lakota (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 3:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN OGLALA LAKOTA AND EAST CENTRAL FALL RIVER COUNTIES THROUGH 345 PM MDT... At 259 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 4 miles northeast of Prairie Winds Casino, or 22 miles northwest of Pine Ridge, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Loneman around 305 PM MDT. Oglala and South Lakeside around 310 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Number 4 and Calico. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
